# Pull Request Template

## Summary
Provide a concise description of the change and why it is needed.

## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] CI / infra
- [ ] Other (describe)

## Changes
- Bullet list of changes made

## How to test
- Steps to reproduce or run the feature locally

## Checklist
- [ ] I added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] I ran `pnpm -w -r run lint` and `pnpm -w -r run typecheck`
- [ ] No sensitive data (secrets) committed
- [ ] CI passes (including `packages/shared` tests)

Assign reviewers and add any relevant labels before requesting review.
